casename: Sunlink Engineering Pte Ltd v Koru Bena Sdn Bhd
counsel: Tan Tian Luh (Rajah & Tann) for the appellants/defendants; Genevieve Chia (Tan Peng Chin LLC) for the respondents/plaintiffs
tags-parsed: Courts and Jurisdiction/Judges/Transfer of cases/Transfer of case from High Court to Subordinate Courts/Whether case should be heard in High Court when amount sued for is below minimum required/Whether sufficient that plaintiff requires High Court judgment for enforcement in Malaysia under reciprocal enforcement legislation
